document.full_text: as speculation about jorge posada swirled for nine innings, the yankees lost their fourth straight game as the offense floundered against josh beckett.
document.title: red sox 6, yankees 0: yanks' night starts oddly, then turns to disaster
lines_and_colors: as speculation about jorge posada swirled for nine innings, the yankees lost their fourth straight game as the offense floundered against josh beckett.
